segments.text: My girlfriend just broke up with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember my first break up . It was the worst feeling in the world . I was crying everyday for three months . And slowly , it got better . I know you'll feel better too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I remember it very clearly . The pain makes it easy to remember . I know you're really hurting right now , but you know many people experience break ups .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it's painful , but it's only temporary . After the pain goes away , you'll find other girls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if I don't want to find another girl ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll change your mind . Look at everyone in the world . They all break up and move on . The faster you understand this , the quicker you will recover .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also know you must still have strong feelings for her , but try to think of all the bad things . You know she didn't treat you that well . Is that the person you want to spend the rest of your life with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll give you a call later . We should hang out . It's good to be around people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S2
